title: Google releases new set of Pixel wallpapers for Black History Month
content:
Black History Month is observed every year in the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, and a few other countries (and in many more regions without official recognition), and in the United States and Canada, it’s the month of February. Google added new wallpapers inspired by Black History Month to its Pixel devices in February of

The post Google releases new set of Pixel wallpapers for Black History Month appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has a new set of Pixel phone wallpapers for Black History Month, designed by illustrator Aur√©lia Durand.
